body: This jacket has the abilities of a lesser poisoner's jacket, and once per day the wearer can create a vial that reproduces the effect of any poison in the Core Rulebook that costs 4,000 gp or less. The jacket's poison always looks like a murky lime fluid. This poison becomes inert after 1 hour.
name: Poisoner's Jacket, Greater
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Chest/Chest Slot Wondrous Items/Poisoners Jacket/Greater
